1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Sandra,
Thank you for letting me know. Unfortunately I am not available during those times today, but am available tomorrow or Thursday. I have included a link to my calendar for you to select a time that works best for you.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I look forward to speaking with you!
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: bell_s@verizon.net [mailto:bell_s@verizon.net] Sent: Tuesday, November 08, 2011 10:11 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Conversation Appointment Confirmation
Dear Ms. Taylor.
I regret to inform you that I need to reschedule my appointment with you. I can do anytime this afternoon from 1-3pm.
Thank you.
Sandra Bell
